meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

presenters: Jake Anderson, Office of Government Affairs
David de la Fuente, Charter Review Commissioner

agenda_items.title: Approval of the February 6, 2024, Charter Review Commission Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Staff Briefing: City Council Composition, Term Lengths, and Term Limits
agenda_items.description: A briefing on the composition, term lengths, and term limits of the City Council.
agenda_items.presenter: Jake Anderson, Office of Government Affairs

agenda_items.title: Staff Briefing: Moving the Election Date
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the potential changes to the election date.
agenda_items.presenter: Jake Anderson, Office of Government Affairs

agenda_items.title: Commissioner Briefing: Council Terms and Election Dates
agenda_items.description: Briefing on council terms and election dates.

agenda_items.title: Commissioner Briefing: Moving the Election Date
agenda_items.description: Further discussion on moving the election date.
agenda_items.presenter: David de la Fuente, Charter Review Commissioner

agenda_items.title: Commissioner Briefing: Staggering City Council Terms
agenda_items.description: Discussion on staggering city council terms.
agenda_items.presenter: David de la Fuente, Charter Review Commissioner

agenda_items.title: Change the City’s form/organization of government
agenda_items.description: Discussion on possible changes to the city's form of government.

agenda_items.title: Expand the size of city council
agenda_items.description: Discussion on expanding the city council size.

agenda_items.title: Abolish or amend the appointment process of the mayor pro tem and deputy mayor pro tem
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the appointment process for mayor pro tem and deputy mayor pro tem.

agenda_items.title: Amend the term-length for City Council positions
agenda_items.description: Discussion on amending the term lengths for city council positions.

agenda_items.title: Stagger council terms
agenda_items.description: Discussion on whether to stagger council terms.

agenda_items.title: Align the terms for members of boards and commissions
agenda_items.description: Discussion on aligning terms for boards and commissions with councilmember terms.

agenda_items.title: Align the terms for municipal judges
agenda_items.description: Discussion on aligning terms for municipal judges with councilmember terms.

agenda_items.title: Move the election date from May of odd-numbered years
agenda_items.description: Discussion on moving the election date.

agenda_items.title: Amend Chapter III §3A regarding the waiting period
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the waiting period for future service on the city council.

agenda_items.title: Charter Review Commission Calendar
agenda_items.description: Review of the Charter Review Commission calendar.
